title: E-Learning Website
description: MVC-based e-learning platform with role-based access for administrators, instructors, and students.
problem: Universities needed a structured platform to manage courses, users, and educational resources.
solution: Developed an MVC-based web application enabling course management, user roles, and digital learning resources.
outcome: Delivered a functional academic e-learning system suitable for university-level usage.

title: RAVA – AI Anomaly Detection in RAN
description: AI platform for detecting anomalies in LTE KPIs within Radio Access Networks.
problem: Manual monitoring of LTE KPIs is inefficient and fails to detect complex anomalies at scale.
solution: Built an AI-driven platform using deep learning models to automatically detect anomalies in LTE KPI time-series data.
outcome: Improved visibility of abnormal network behavior and supported proactive network monitoring.

title: Assurini – Mobile Car Insurance
description: Mobile application for car insurance requests, claims management, and payments.
problem: Traditional car insurance processes are slow and require physical presence.
solution: Developed a mobile app allowing users to submit insurance requests, manage claims, and handle payments remotely.
outcome: Demonstrated a mobile-first approach to digital insurance services.

title: Walmart Store Sales Forecasting
description: Sales prediction system using historical Walmart store data with dashboard visualization.
problem: Retail businesses require accurate sales forecasting for planning and inventory management.
solution: Processed historical sales data, selected appropriate ML models, and exposed predictions via a Flask dashboard.
outcome: Provided insights into sales trends and seasonal patterns.

title: RegisterCom – Company Registration
description: Mobile application for tracking company registration requests and notifications.
problem: Business registration processes lack transparency and real-time tracking.
solution: Built a mobile app enabling users to submit registration requests and receive status notifications.
outcome: Digitized and simplified company registration tracking.

title: SecureAuth – Biometric Authentication
description: Desktop application implementing facial, voice, and fingerprint authentication.
problem: Password-based authentication systems lack sufficient security.
solution: Implemented a multi-biometric authentication system combining face, voice, and fingerprint recognition.
outcome: Demonstrated enhanced authentication reliability using biometric modalities.

title: QuickLab – AI-Driven Lab Management
description: Secure web platform for managing laboratory operations.
problem: Laboratory operations rely on manual workflows and fragmented data systems.
solution: Developed a Django-based platform to manage lab operations, users, and data securely.
outcome: Improved efficiency and reliability of laboratory management processes.
